          <title>
            <string language="en">Using microwaves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden von von Mikrowellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation des micro-ondes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando microondas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando le microonde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση των μικροκυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usar microondas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations showing the use of microwaves. A microwave oven uses microwaves to heat food.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microwaves</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die den Gebrauch von
Mikrowellen zeigen. Ein Mikrowellenherd verwendet Mikrowellen, 
um Nahrung zu erhitzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations montrant 
l'utilisation des micro-ondes. Un four à micro-ondes emploie 
des micro-ondes pour chauffer la nourriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram o
uso das microondas. Um forno de microonda usa microondas aquecer
o alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano 
l'uso delle microonde. Un forno a microonde usa le microonde per
riscaldare l'alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τη χρήση των 
μικροκυμάτων. Ένας φούρνος μικροκυμάτων χρησιμοποιεί τα 
μικροκύματα στα τρόφιμα θερμότητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran el uso 
de microondas. Un horno de microonda utiliza microondas para 
calentar el alimento.</string>
          </description>
